entry.summary:
Author: AFanofEverything90

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,077Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 68

Summary: The Past Eighteen years have been lonely for one special girl, ever since losing her mother at a young age and being put into a new home called Wayne Manor. She always yearned for love and approve from her family, but not anymore she gave up on them like they did her.She was no longer a child desperate for love and approval now she was becoming a woman. Y/n ended up leaving the manor one day and everything started to change. Those same faces that would ignore her seemed to now focus only onto her.Now Y/n was away living her life in a new town and making friends finally happy, but like the saying goes all good things come to an end but will she let it?
